thread.title: Y-3 Releases The BOOST-Infused Kozoko High In Two New Colors
thread.title_full: Y-3 Releases The BOOST-Infused Kozoko High In Two New Colors

author: Jesse Bernard
title: Y-3 Releases The BOOST-Infused Kozoko High In Two New Colors
text:
Visit the original post to see all 4 images from this gallery. 
Y-3 has started the year off strong following the teasing of new sneakers coming this year and the release of the Yohji Boost Spring Collection . The brand’s latest drop comes in the form of the Kozoko High in two monochrome colorways.
The pack features an avant-garde design with bold color blocking and modern materials. Premium leather covers the split inner collar, with neoprene and lightweight mesh materials giving the upper a sock-like feel. The sleek rendition is finished with contrasting branding at the toe and heel counter, while Boost™ technology wraps the mid sole for responsive energy.
The Kozoko silhouette is available now in stores and online for $390:
Shop Now You can also purchase the Y-3 Yohji Boost Spring Collection which is available now:
 
In other news, Nike plans to release the FlyKnit Racer “Cookies and Cream” this week.
